name: Mercy
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mercy
des:
Most of us don't think about our primary care physicians until we get sick or injured, and then going to the doctor is the only thing on our minds. Choosing Mercy for your primary care means you have convenient access to a team of pediatricians, OB/GYNs, family and internal medicine doctors who can handle all your routine health care needs, such as annual checkups, immunizations, school, sports and work physicals, and diagnosis and treatment of common illnesses and injuries. 

Mercy, named one of the top five large U.S. health systems in 2018, 2017 and 2016 by IBM Watson Health, serves millions annually. Across four states, a team of more than 2,100 Mercy primary and specialty care physicians, 600 advanced practitioners and supporting staff deliver health care services through more than 300 offices.

The Mercy skill walks you through the process of finding a doctor near you and getting their contact information.

This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
